title: TO_INTEGER
description: Converts a value to an Integer. If the input cannot be converted, the function throws an error.

parameters.name: string/decimal/double/float/integer
parameters.description: The string to convert into a Integer

examples:
IF(
    Annual_Sales__c >= TO_INTEGER(Annual_Target_Text__c),
    "Target Achieved",
    "Target Not Met"
)
-- Converts the text field 'Annual_Target_Text__c' into an integer.
-- It then compares this target to the numeric field 'Annual_Sales__c' to determine whether the sales target has been met.

tips.text: If the input is a string, it must represent an integer; otherwise, an error may occur.
For numeric inputs, any fractional part is truncated rather than rounded.
